evaluation_metrics.name: audit_completion_accuracy
evaluation_metrics.description: Verify that audits are completed correctly with all required fields filled and validated

evaluation_metrics.name: data_sync_reliability
evaluation_metrics.description: Ensure real-time sync between mobile and backend captures all audit responses without loss
criteria: All submitted items appear in backend database

evaluation_metrics.name: category_navigation_flow
evaluation_metrics.description: Validate that auto-navigation between categories works correctly and audit flow is smooth
criteria: User navigates through categories in correct order

test_scenarios.name: Complete CVR Audit with Multiple Items
test_scenarios.description: User completes a full CVR (Customer Service) audit with items spanning multiple categories
test_scenarios.expected_outcome: All items submitted, categories navigated sequentially, progress updates in real-time

test_scenarios.name: Offline Submission with Sync
test_scenarios.description: User submits audit items while offline, then reconnects to sync data
test_scenarios.expected_outcome: Items stored locally, synced on reconnect, no data loss

test_scenarios.name: Multi-Category Item Entry
test_scenarios.description: User enters dynamic items across multiple categories in single audit
test_scenarios.expected_outcome: Items categorized correctly, navigation preserves context, data integrity maintained

test_scenarios.name: Long Audit Session
test_scenarios.description: User conducts extended audit session (30+ minutes) with multiple category transitions
test_scenarios.expected_outcome: Session remains stable, no crashes, sync completes successfully

test_scenarios.name: Concurrent Multi-User Audits
test_scenarios.description: Multiple users submit audits simultaneously to same restaurant
test_scenarios.expected_outcome: All submissions recorded, no conflicts, data consistency maintained
